אחת המטרות לשמן ייסדנו את גיקטיים היתה לקדם את קהילת ההייטק בארץ. בפוסט הגיקג’וב השבועי, אנחנו מפרסמים חלק מהמשרות המפורסמות בלוח משרות ההייטק החדש של גיקטיים. אם אתם מעוניינים למצוא משרות נוספות או לפרסם משרות שלכם, אתם מוזמנים לעשות זאת באמצעות לוח המשרות החדש שלנו – Geeklist. שתפו את הפוסט והעבירו הלאה כדי לעזור לחברות להפיץ את המשרות ולגולשי גיקטיים למצוא את העבודה החדשה שהם מחפשים.
Perion is a global technology company that provides digital advertising technology solutions to brands and publishers.
At Undertone by Perion we are looking for a Senior Server Developer to join our Development Team. Our mission is to deliver Standout Brand Experiences™ and we do it by combining the best creative, context, people and technology. If your passion is to develop high performing servers and solve complex challenges in short cycles while working as part of a talented team and influencing a huge market – let’s talk.
Job Responsibilities:
– Make ideas become a reality using your versatile programming skills, and affect a huge market
– Be part of a team of technological aces, implementing state of the art architecture while leveraging cutting edge technologies
– Lead features from design to production in short iterations using the most advanced engineering practices and processes
– Participate and influence every aspect of the development process, starting from the specifications, through the design, development and deployment, to live production systems
– Work closely with data sciences experts
– Continuously learn and share learning with the team
Requirements:
– A minimum of 3 years experience in server development, creating robust and high performing servers, serving millions of requests per day
– A minimum of 3 years experience in Java programming
– A minimum of B.A./B.Sc in Computer Science or similar field from a leading university required
– Passion for implementing software engineering and agile/lean best practices
Extensive experience in OOP, Unit testing/TDD. Experience with implementing Continuous Deployment – an advantage
– Familiarity with at least one of the following technologies: C/C++, Golang, NodeJS – an advantage
– Fluent verbal and written English skills required

– At least two years of experience in machine learning and data driven algorithm implementation in Java/Python/C#
– Experience in high-scale multi variable machine learning problems
– Experience in real world problem solving of data algorithms
– Passionate about data: processing, slicing, visualizations and comprehension of large data sets
– We code in Java but welcome people from all stacks

Gigya is looking for a Java Developer for our Big Data group. Ideal candidates have a strong Java background and enjoy working on the cutting edge of Big Data technologies. The position is located at Gigya’s R&D center, Azrieli Towers, Tel Aviv.
The primary challenge for the Java Developer – Big Data will be the design and development of in the Big-Data ecosystem. Success means that systems you plan and build have high scalability, low down-time and provide value and insight to our customers.
Job Responsibilities:
– Design & develop Big Data storage platforms.
– Plan and build creative solutions that operate at huge scale.
– Maintain the entire product lifecycle, from RFP, planning, execution, QA, and through to production.
– Data operations on real customer data
Requirements:
– 4+ years experience programming in Java
– Experience with RDBMS or NoSQL database systems
– Experience with asynchronous and multithreaded programming
– Experience with Linux

Job Responsibilities:

– Have a cross function responsibility to lead external solutions onboarding on Predix, bringing external and internal teams together for on time delivery on predix.io.
– Drive increased efficiency across the teams, eliminating duplication, develop reference design patterns & software code, leveraging product and technology reuse.
Requirements:
– Bachelor’s or Masters degree in Computer Science or in Science, Technology, Engineering or Math.
– A minimum of 1 year of technical experience in relevant areas and functions within a product/platform •organization but not essential. Proven project management skills is important.
– Proven project management skills.
